code: @Test public void createWhenHrefIsNullShouldThrowException() {     assertThatIllegalArgumentException().isThrownBy(() -> new Link(null)).withMessageContaining("HREF must not be null"). }
@Test public void getHrefShouldReturnHref() {     String href = "http://example.com".     Link link = new Link(href).     assertThat(link.getHref()).isEqualTo(href). }
@Test public void isTemplatedWhenContainsPlaceholderShouldReturnTrue() {     String href = "http://example.com/{path}".     Link link = new Link(href).     assertThat(link.isTemplated()).isTrue(). }

@Test public void isTemplatedWhenContainsNoPlaceholderShouldReturnFalse() {     String href = "http://example.com/path".     Link link = new Link(href).     assertThat(link.isTemplated()).isFalse(). }
